plugin.name: HooK_MiniEpics
plugin.author: BlueFeather
plugin.description: A collection of triggers for use in Titan and Terra miniepics - to make life there easier.

trigger.match: * grabs a nearby shield to defend himself!
* wears a Mighty Shield as a shield.
With awesome force * cleaves *'s shield in half!
* is surrounded by a shimmering white aura of divine protection.
The white aura around *'s body vanishes.

muclient.script:
env_active = false
----------------- -- Zone awareness ----------------- function OnPluginBroadcast(msg, id, name, text) if env_active then Note('msg: ['..msg..'], id: ['..id..'], name: ['..name..'], text: ['..text..']') end end
function toggle_debug() if env_active then env_active = false Note('MiniEpics debug: [OFF]') else env_active = true Note('MiniEpics debug: [ON]') end end
